title: Add an option to remove chat and add more pings.
body:
I do believe chat is necessary because we simply can't cover everything with pings.

* jungle locations

* asking for vision

* some more i can't think of


I believe these would be good improvements and would allow us to drop chat and toxicity while not hurting tactics.

replies.body: A lot of things can never be conveyed with pings, removing chat is a huge liability to a half-decent team. The rest of the playerbase should not have to suffer for the children that cant control themselves, on both ends of the toxicity specrum.
